title: Lunch and Dinner Menu
text: Mon - Friday 11:00 AM to 8:00 PM Saturday 11:30 AM -8:00 PM Homemade Dressings: French (Our House), Ranch, Thousand Island, Blue Cheese, Italian Herb & Spice, Honey Mustard Dressings: Kraft Fat-Free Raspberry Vinaigrette Chopped turkey, egg, peas, bacon, cheese and tomatoes.
